meanings.definition: A type of stitching done on the top side of a garment for decorative or reinforcing purposes.
meanings.sent1: The topstitching on her dress added a nice touch of elegance.
meanings.sent2: She carefully did the topstitching on the hem of the skirt.
meanings.sent3: The topstitching on his shirt was so fancy, it looked like a mini parade.
meanings.sent4: Her topstitching was like a row of tiny soldiers standing guard on the fabric.
meanings.sent5: The topstitching stood out like a bright ribbon on a present.

meanings.definition: The act of sewing a line of stitches on the top side of a fabric.
meanings.sent1: After learning how to do topstitching, she felt proud of her new skill.
meanings.sent2: The topstitching on the pillow gave it a neat and finished look.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his topstitching was so straight, it could guide lost ants home.
meanings.sent4: Her topstitching was like a musical note dancing along the edge of the fabric.
meanings.sent5: The topstitching was as precise as a laser beam on the material.
